title: Exploring the barriers to feminine healthcare access among marginalized women in Bangladesh and facilitating access through a voice bot
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Sreya Sanyal Puja, Nahian Noor Neha, Ofia Rahman Alif, Tarannaum Jahan Sultan, Md. Golam Zel Asmaul Husna, Ishrat Jahan, Jannatun Noor
